column5: Yes! And myADHD makes them more irritating and intensified!!
I’m so ashamed to even want to discuss it and bring back those memories. I know it’s not good but sometimes I just want to pretend like it didn’t happen.

Thank you for sharing your experience with me! It means a lot to know I’m not alone.
I also know how hard that might of been to admit as well. Mental health is a huge battle between yourself and your mind! It’s exhausting!!
